changeSet.author: milicavulic
changeSet.sql: create sequence user_kyc_seq; create table if not exists user_kyc ( id bigint not null constraint user_kyc_pkey primary key, auditor_id bigint constraint user_kyc_fk_on_auditor references auth, person_id bigint constraint user_kyc_fk_on_person references person, request_state_id bigint constraint user_kyc_fk_on_request_state references request_state, content varchar(10000) );
